standard.name: Standard
standard.desc: The standard ruleset for all offical Smogon singles tiers (Ubers, OU, etc.)

standarddoubles.name: Standard Doubles
standarddoubles.desc: The standard ruleset for all official Smogon doubles tiers

obtainablemoves.name: Obtainable Moves
obtainablemoves.desc: Makes sure moves are learnable by the species.

gravitysleepclause.name: Gravity Sleep Clause
gravitysleepclause.desc: Bans Gravity + sleep moves below 100% accuracy

teampreview.name: Team Preview
teampreview.desc: Allows each player to see the Pokémon on their opponent's team before they choose their lead Pokémon

standardoms.name: Standard OMs
standardoms.desc: The standard ruleset for all Smogon OMs (Almost Any Ability, STABmons, etc.)

tiershiftmod.desc: Pokémon below OU get their stats, excluding HP, boosted. UU/RUBL get +10, RU/NUBL get +20, NU/PUBL get +30, and PU or lower get +40.
tiershiftmod.name: Tier Shift Mod

bonustypemod.desc: Pokémon can be nicknamed the name of a type to have that type added onto their current ones.
bonustypemod.name: Bonus Type Mod

standardnext.name: Standard NEXT
standardnext.desc: The standard ruleset for the NEXT mod

flatrules.name: Flat Rules
flatrules.desc: The in-game Flat Rules: Adjust Level Down 50, Species Clause, Item Clause, -Mythical, -Restricted Legendary, Bring 6 Pick 3-6 depending on game type.

limittworestricted.name: Limit Two Restricted
limittworestricted.desc: Limit two restricted Pokémon (flagged with * in the rules list)

limitonerestricted.name: Limit One Restricted
limitonerestricted.desc: Limit one restricted Pokémon (flagged with * in the rules list)

standardnatdex.name: Standard NatDex
standardnatdex.desc: The standard ruleset for all National Dex tiers

obtainable.name: Obtainable
obtainable.desc: Makes sure the team is possible to obtain in-game.

obtainableabilities.name: Obtainable Abilities
obtainableabilities.desc: Makes sure abilities match the species.

obtainableformes.name: Obtainable Formes
obtainableformes.desc: Makes sure in-battle formes only appear in-battle.

obtainablemisc.name: Obtainable Misc
obtainablemisc.desc: Validate all obtainability things that aren't moves/abilities (Hidden Power type, gender, IVs, events, duplicate moves).

hoennpokedex.name: Hoenn Pokedex
hoennpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Hoenn region (OR/AS)

sinnohpokedex.name: Sinnoh Pokedex
sinnohpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Sinnoh region (Platinum)

oldunovapokedex.name: Old Unova Pokedex
oldunovapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Unova region as of the original Black/White games

newunovapokedex.name: New Unova Pokedex
newunovapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Unova region as of the Black 2/White 2 games

kalospokedex.name: Kalos Pokedex
kalospokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Kalos region (XY)

oldalolapokedex.name: Old Alola Pokedex
oldalolapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Alola region (SUMO)

newalolapokedex.name: New Alola Pokedex
newalolapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Alola region (US/UM)

galarpokedex.name: Galar Pokedex
galarpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Galar region (Sw/Sh)

isleofarmorpokedex.name: Isle of Armor Pokedex
isleofarmorpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Isle of Armor in the Galar Region (Sw/Sh DLC1)

crowntundrapokedex.name: Crown Tundra Pokedex
crowntundrapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Crown Tundra in the Galar Region (Sw/Sh DLC2)

galarexpansionpokedex.name: Galar Expansion Pokedex
galarexpansionpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Galar region, Isle of Armor, or Crown Tundra (Sw/Sh + Expansion Pass)

paldeapokedex.name: Paldea Pokedex
paldeapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Paldea region (SV)

kitakamipokedex.name: Kitakami Pokedex
kitakamipokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Kitakami region (SV DLC1)

blueberrypokedex.name: Blueberry Pokedex
blueberrypokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Blueberry Academy (SV DLC2)

potd.name: PotD
potd.desc: Forces the Pokemon of the Day onto every random team.

forcemonotype.name: Force Monotype
forcemonotype.desc: Forces all teams to have the same type. Usage: Force Monotype = [Type], e.g. "Force Monotype = Water"

forcemonocolor.name: Force Monocolor
forcemonocolor.desc: Forces all teams to have Pokémon of the same color. Usage: Force Monocolor = [Color], e.g. "Force Monocolor = Blue"

forceteratype.name: Force Tera Type
forceteratype.desc: Forces all Pokémon to have the same Tera Type. Usage: Force Tera Type = [Type], e.g. "Force Tera Type = Dragon"

forceselect.name: Force Select
forceselect.desc: Forces a Pokemon to be on the team and selected at Team Preview. Usage: Force Select = [Pokemon], e.g. "Force Select = Magikarp"

evlimits.name: EV Limits
evlimits.desc: Require EVs to be in specific ranges, such as: "EV Limits = Atk 0-124 / Def 100-252"

teratypepreview.name: Tera Type Preview
teratypepreview.desc: Allows each player to see the Tera Type of the Pokémon on their opponent's team before they choose their lead Pokémon

onevsone.name: One vs One
onevsone.desc: Only allows one Pokémon in battle

twovstwo.name: Two vs Two
twovstwo.desc: Only allows two Pokémon in battle

littlecup.name: Little Cup
littlecup.desc: Only allows Pokémon that can evolve and don't have any prior evolutions

blitz.name: Blitz
blitz.desc: Super-fast 'Blitz' timer giving 30 second Team Preview and 10 seconds per turn.

vgctimer.name: VGC Timer
vgctimer.desc: VGC's timer: 90 second Team Preview, 7 minutes Your Time, 1 minute per turn

speciesclause.name: Species Clause
speciesclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon from the same species

nicknameclause.name: Nickname Clause
nicknameclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon with the same nickname

itemclause.name: Item Clause
itemclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon with the same item

doubleitemclause.name: Double Item Clause
doubleitemclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than two Pokémon with the same item

abilityclause.name: Ability Clause
abilityclause.desc: Prevents teams from having Pokémon with the same ability than allowed

ohkoclause.name: OHKO Clause
ohkoclause.desc: Bans all OHKO moves, such as Fissure

evasionclause.name: Evasion Clause
evasionclause.desc: Bans abilities, items, and moves that boost Evasion

evasionabilitiesclause.name: Evasion Abilities Clause
evasionabilitiesclause.desc: Bans abilities that boost Evasion under certain weather conditions

evasionitemsclause.name: Evasion Items Clause
evasionitemsclause.desc: Bans items that lower the accuracy of moves used against the user

evasionmovesclause.name: Evasion Moves Clause
evasionmovesclause.desc: Bans moves that consistently raise the user's evasion when used

accuracymovesclause.name: Accuracy Moves Clause
accuracymovesclause.desc: Bans moves that have a chance to lower the target's accuracy when used

sleepmovesclause.name: Sleep Moves Clause
sleepmovesclause.desc: Bans all moves that induce sleep, such as Hypnosis

endlessbattleclause.name: Endless Battle Clause
endlessbattleclause.desc: Prevents players from forcing a battle which their opponent cannot end except by forfeit

batonpassclause.name: Baton Pass Clause
batonpassclause.desc: Stops teams from having more than one Pokémon with Baton Pass, and no Pokémon may be capable of passing boosts to both Speed and another stat

onebatonpassclause.name: One Baton Pass Clause
onebatonpassclause.desc: Stops teams from having more than one Pokémon with Baton Pass

oneboostpasserclause.name: One Boost Passer Clause
oneboostpasserclause.desc: Stops teams from having a Pokémon with Baton Pass that has multiple ways to boost its stats, and no more than one Baton Passer may be able to boost its stats

batonpassstatclause.name: Baton Pass Stat Clause
batonpassstatclause.desc: Stops teams from having a Pokémon with Baton Pass that has any way to boost its stats

batonpassstattrapclause.name: Baton Pass Stat Trap Clause
batonpassstattrapclause.desc: Stops teams from having a Pokémon with Baton Pass that has any way to boost its stats or trap Pokémon.

cfzclause.name: CFZ Clause
cfzclause.desc: Bans the use of crystal-free Z-Moves

notfullyevolved.name: Not Fully Evolved
notfullyevolved.desc: Bans Pokémon that are fully evolved or can't evolve

hppercentagemod.name: HP Percentage Mod
hppercentagemod.desc: Shows the HP of Pokémon in percentages

exacthpmod.name: Exact HP Mod
exacthpmod.desc: Shows the exact HP of all Pokémon

cancelmod.name: Cancel Mod
cancelmod.desc: Allows players to change their own choices before their opponents make one

sleepclausemod.name: Sleep Clause Mod
sleepclausemod.desc: Prevents players from putting more than one of their opponent's Pokémon to sleep at a time, and bans Mega Gengar from using Hypnosis

stadiumsleepclause.name: Stadium Sleep Clause
stadiumsleepclause.desc: Prevents players from putting one of their opponent's Pokémon to sleep if any of the opponent's other Pokémon are asleep (different from Sleep Clause Mod because putting your own Pokémon to sleep is enough to prevent opponents from putting your others to sleep).

switchpriorityclausemod.name: Switch Priority Clause Mod
switchpriorityclausemod.desc: Makes a faster Pokémon switch first when double-switching, unlike in Emerald link battles, where player 1's Pokémon would switch first

desyncclausemod.name: Desync Clause Mod
desyncclausemod.desc: If a desync would happen, the move fails instead. This rule currently covers Bide, Counter, and Psywave.

deoxyscamouflageclause.name: Deoxys Camouflage Clause
deoxyscamouflageclause.desc: Reveals the Deoxys forme when it is sent in battle.

freezeclausemod.name: Freeze Clause Mod
freezeclausemod.desc: Prevents players from freezing more than one of their opponent's Pokémon at a time

sametypeclause.name: Same Type Clause
sametypeclause.desc: Forces all Pokémon on a team to share a type with each other

enforcesameteratype.name: Enforce Same Tera Type
enforcesameteratype.desc: Forces Pokémon to have a Tera Type matching one of their original types.

arceusevlimit.name: Arceus EV Limit
arceusevlimit.desc: Restricts Arceus to a maximum of 100 EVs in any one stat, and only multiples of 10

inversemod.name: Inverse Mod
inversemod.desc: The mod for Inverse Battle which inverts the type effectiveness chart; weaknesses become resistances, while resistances and immunities become weaknesses

minsourcegen.name: Min Source Gen
minsourcegen.desc: Pokemon must be obtained from this generation or later.

omunobtainablemoves.name: OM Unobtainable Moves
omunobtainablemoves.desc: Allows special move legality rules to allow moves which are otherwise unobtainable without hacking or glitches

stabmonsmovelegality.name: STABmons Move Legality
stabmonsmovelegality.desc: Allows Pokémon to use any move that they or a previous evolution/out-of-battle forme share a type with

alphabetcupmovelegality.name: Alphabet Cup Move Legality
alphabetcupmovelegality.desc: Allows Pokémon to use any move that shares the same first letter as their name or a previous evolution's name.

sketchmonsmovelegality.name: Sketchmons Move Legality
sketchmonsmovelegality.desc: Pokémon can learn one of any move they don't normally learn.

camomonsmod.name: Camomons Mod
camomonsmod.desc: Pokémon have their types set to match their first two moves.

allowtradeback.name: Allow Tradeback
allowtradeback.desc: Allows Gen 1 pokemon to have moves from their Gen 2 learnsets

allowavs.name: Allow AVs
allowavs.desc: Tells formats with the 'gen7letsgo' mod to take Awakening Values into consideration when calculating stats

sketchpostgen7moves.name: Sketch Post-Gen 7 Moves
sketchpostgen7moves.desc: Allows Pokémon who learn Sketch to learn any Gen 8+ move (normally, Sketch is not usable in Gen 8+).

mimicglitch.name: Mimic Glitch
mimicglitch.desc: Allows any Pokemon with access to Assist, Copycat, Metronome, Mimic, or Transform to gain access to almost any other move.

overflowstatmod.name: Overflow Stat Mod
overflowstatmod.desc: Caps stats at 654 after a positive nature, or 655 after a negative nature

formeclause.name: Forme Clause
formeclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon of the same forme

350cupmod.name: 350 Cup Mod
350cupmod.desc: If a Pokémon's BST is 350 or lower, all of its stats get doubled.

flippedmod.name: Flipped Mod
flippedmod.desc: Every Pokémon's stats are reversed. HP becomes Spe, Atk becomes Sp. Def, Def becomes Sp. Atk, and vice versa.

scalemonsmod.name: Scalemons Mod
scalemonsmod.desc: Every Pokémon's stats, barring HP, are scaled to give them a BST as close to 600 as possible

teamtypepreview.name: Team Type Preview
teamtypepreview.desc: Allows each player to see the Pokémon on their opponent's team and those Pokémon's types before they choose their lead Pokémon

openteamsheets.name: Open Team Sheets
openteamsheets.desc: Allows each player to see the Pokémon and all non-stat information about them, before they choose their lead Pokémon

forceopenteamsheets.name: Force Open Team Sheets
forceopenteamsheets.desc: Allows each player to see the Pokémon and all non-stat information about them, before they choose their lead Pokémon

aaarestrictedabilities.name: AAA Restricted Abilities
aaarestrictedabilities.desc: Allows validation for AAA formats to use restricted abilities instead of banned ones.

eventmovesclause.name: Event Moves Clause
eventmovesclause.desc: Bans moves only obtainable through events.

pickedteamsize.name: Picked Team Size
pickedteamsize.desc: Team size (number of pokemon) that can be brought out of Team Preview

minteamsize.name: Min Team Size
minteamsize.desc: Minimum team size (number of pokemon) that can be brought into Team Preview (or into the battle, in formats without Team Preview)

evlimit.name: EV Limit
evlimit.desc: Maximum total EVs on each pokemon.

maxteamsize.name: Max Team Size
maxteamsize.desc: Maximum team size (number of pokemon) that can be brought into Team Preview (or into the battle, in formats without Team Preview)

maxmovecount.name: Max Move Count
maxmovecount.desc: Max number of moves allowed on a single pokemon (defaults to 4 in a normal game)

maxtotallevel.name: Max Total Level
maxtotallevel.desc: Teams are restricted to a total maximum Level limit and Pokemon are restricted to a set range of Levels

maxlevel.name: Max Level
maxlevel.desc: Maximum level of brought Pokémon (if you're using both this and Adjust Level, this will control what level moves you have access to)

defaultlevel.name: Default Level
defaultlevel.desc: Default level of brought Pokémon (normally should be equal to Max Level, except Custom Games have a very high max level but still default to 100)

adjustlevel.name: Adjust Level
adjustlevel.desc: All Pokémon will be set to exactly this level (but unlike Max Level and Min Level, it will still be able to learn moves from above this level) (when using this, Max Level is the level of the pokemon before it's level-adjusted down)

adjustleveldown.name: Adjust Level Down
adjustleveldown.desc: Any Pokémon above this level will be set to this level (but unlike Max Level, it will still be able to learn moves from above this level)

stadiumitemsclause.name: Stadium Items Clause
stadiumitemsclause.desc: Bans items that are not usable in Pokemon Stadium 2.

nc2000movelegality.name: NC 2000 Move Legality
nc2000movelegality.desc: Prevents Pokémon from having moves that would only be obtainable in Pokémon Crystal.

aptclause.name: APT Clause
aptclause.desc: Bans the combination of Agility and partial trapping moves like Wrap.

nc1997movelegality.name: NC 1997 Move Legality
nc1997movelegality.desc: Bans move combinations on Pokémon that weren't legal in NC 1997.

noswitching.name: No Switching
noswitching.desc: All Pokémon are trapped (cannot switch naturally, but can as the effect of an item, move, or Ability).

crazyhouserule.name: Crazyhouse Rule
crazyhouserule.desc: Pokémon you KO are added to your team and removed from the opponent's, and vice versa.

chimera1v1rule.name: Chimera 1v1 Rule
chimera1v1rule.desc: Merges a team of six into a single Pokémon depending on the order chosen at team preview: It gains the typing of the first, item of the second, ability of the third, stats of the fourth, the first two moves of the fifth, and the last two moves of the sixth.

firstbloodrule.name: First Blood Rule
firstbloodrule.desc: The first team to have a Pokémon faint loses.

revelationmonsmod.name: Revelationmons Mod
revelationmonsmod.desc: The moves in the first slot(s) of a Pokémon's set have their types changed to match the Pokémon's type(s).

reevolutionmod.name: Re-Evolution Mod
reevolutionmod.desc: Pokémon gain the stat changes they would gain from evolving again.

brokenrecordmod.name: Broken Record Mod
brokenrecordmod.desc: Pokémon can hold a TR to use that move in battle.

forceofthefallenmod.name: Force of the Fallen Mod
forceofthefallenmod.desc: Pokémon pass the move in their last moveslot to their allies when they are KOed.

categoryswapmod.name: Category Swap Mod
categoryswapmod.desc: All physical moves become special, and all special moves become physical.

voltturnmayhemmod.name: VoltTurn Mayhem Mod
voltturnmayhemmod.desc: Every move that targets a foe causes the user to switch out after use.

convergencelegality.name: Convergence Legality
convergencelegality.desc: Allows all Pokémon that have identical types to share moves and abilities.

hackmonsformelegality.name: Hackmons Forme Legality
hackmonsformelegality.desc: Enforces proper forme legality for hackmons-based metagames.

speciesrevealclause.name: Species Reveal Clause
speciesrevealclause.desc: Reveals a Pokémon's true species in hackmons-based metagames.

franticfusionsmod.name: Frantic Fusions Mod
franticfusionsmod.desc: Pokémon nicknamed after another Pokémon get their stats buffed by 1/4 of that Pokémon's stats, barring HP, and access to their abilities.

proteanpalacemod.name: Protean Palace Mod
proteanpalacemod.desc: Pokémon become the type of the move they use.

bestof.name: Best Of
bestof.desc: Allows players to define a best-of series where the winner of the series is the winner of the majority of games.

illusionlevelmod.name: Illusion Level Mod
illusionlevelmod.desc: Changes the Illusion ability to disguise the Pokémon's level instead of leaking it.

gen9randombattle.name: [Gen 9] Random Battle
gen9randombattle.desc: Randomized teams of Pokémon with sets that are generated to be competitively viable.

gen91v1.name: [Gen 9] 1v1
gen91v1.desc: Bring three Pokémon to Team Preview and choose one to battle.

gen92v2doubles.name: [Gen 9] 2v2 Doubles
gen92v2doubles.desc: Double battle where you bring four Pokémon to Team Preview and choose only two.

gen9nfe.name: [Gen 9] NFE
gen9nfe.desc: Only Pokémon that can evolve are allowed.

gen9vaporemons.name: [Gen 9] VaporeMons
gen9vaporemons.desc: A Gen 9 mod where Pokémon, moves, items, abilities, and non-stat Pokémon adjustments are added to the game.

gen1moderngen1.name: [Gen 1] Modern Gen 1
gen1moderngen1.desc: A Gen 1 solomod where all Pokémon and moves from future generations are legal.

gen9foresighters.name: [Gen 9] Foresighters
gen9foresighters.desc: Moves in the first moveslot will be delayed by two turns.

gen9balancedhackmonsuu.name: [Gen 9] Balanced Hackmons UU
gen9balancedhackmonsuu.desc: Anything directly hackable onto a set (EVs, IVs, forme, ability, item, and move) and is usable in local battles is allowed.

gen9partnersincrime.name: [Gen 9] Partners in Crime
gen9partnersincrime.desc: Doubles-based metagame where both active ally Pokémon share abilities and moves.

gen9almostanyability.name: [Gen 9] Almost Any Ability
gen9almostanyability.desc: Pokémon have access to almost any ability.

gen9balancedhackmons.name: [Gen 9] Balanced Hackmons
gen9balancedhackmons.desc: Anything directly hackable onto a set (EVs, IVs, forme, ability, item, and move) and is usable in local battles is allowed.

gen9godlygift.name: [Gen 9] Godly Gift
gen9godlygift.desc: Each Pokémon receives one base stat from a God (Restricted Pokémon) depending on its position in the team. If there is no restricted Pokémon, it uses the Pokémon in the first slot.

gen9inheritance.name: [Gen 9] Inheritance
gen9inheritance.desc: Pokémon may use the ability and moves of another, as long as they forfeit their own learnset.

gen9mixandmega.name: [Gen 9] Mix and Mega
gen9mixandmega.desc: Mega evolve any Pokémon with any mega stone, or transform them with Primal orbs, Origin orbs, and Rusted items with no limit. Mega and Primal boosts based on form changes from gen 7.

gen9sharedpower.name: [Gen 9] Shared Power
gen9sharedpower.desc: Once a Pokémon switches in, its ability is shared with the rest of the team.

gen9stabmons.name: [Gen 9] STABmons
gen9stabmons.desc: Pokémon can use any move of their typing, in addition to the moves they can normally learn.

gen7purehackmons.name: [Gen 7] Pure Hackmons
gen7purehackmons.desc: Anything that can be hacked in-game and is usable in local battles is allowed.

gen9camomons.name: [Gen 9] Camomons
gen9camomons.desc: Pokémon have their types set to match their first two moves.

gen9convergence.name: [Gen 9] Convergence
gen9convergence.desc: Allows all Pokémon that have identical types to share moves and abilities.

gen9crossevolution.name: [Gen 9] Cross Evolution
gen9crossevolution.desc: Give a Pokémon a Pokémon name of the next evolution stage as a nickname to inherit stat changes, typing, abilities, and moves from the next stage Pokémon.

gen9fortemons.name: [Gen 9] Fortemons
gen9fortemons.desc: Put an attacking move in the item slot to have all of a Pokémon's attacks inherit its properties.

gen9franticfusions.name: [Gen 9] Frantic Fusions
gen9franticfusions.desc: Pokémon nicknamed after another Pokémon get their stats buffed by 1/4 of that Pokémon's stats, barring HP, and access to one of their abilities.

gen9fullpotential.name: [Gen 9] Full Potential
gen9fullpotential.desc: Pokémon's moves hit off of their highest stat, except HP.

gen9pokebilities.name: [Gen 9] Pokebilities
gen9pokebilities.desc: Pokémon have all of their released abilities simultaneously.

gen9purehackmons.name: [Gen 9] Pure Hackmons
gen9purehackmons.desc: Anything directly hackable onto a set (EVs, IVs, forme, ability, item, and move) and is usable in local battles is allowed.

gen9revelationmons.name: [Gen 9] Revelationmons
gen9revelationmons.desc: The moves in the first slot(s) of a Pokémon's set have their types changed to match the Pokémon's type(s).

gen9sharingiscaring.name: [Gen 9] Sharing is Caring
gen9sharingiscaring.desc: All Pokémon on a team share their items.

gen9teradonation.name: [Gen 9] Tera Donation
gen9teradonation.desc: The first Pokémon sent out immediately terastallizes. The other Pokémon in the party inherit that Tera Type as an additional type.

gen9thecardgame.name: [Gen 9] The Card Game
gen9thecardgame.desc: The type chart is simplified based off of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.

gen9thelosersgame.name: [Gen 9] The Loser's Game
gen9thelosersgame.desc: The first player to lose all of their Pokémon wins.

gen9trademarked.name: [Gen 9] Trademarked
gen9trademarked.desc: Sacrifice your Pokémon's ability for a status move that activates on switch-in.

gen6purehackmons.name: [Gen 6] Pure Hackmons
gen6purehackmons.desc: Anything that can be hacked in-game and is usable in local battles is allowed.

gen9nationaldexbh.name: [Gen 9] National Dex BH
gen9nationaldexbh.desc: Balanced Hackmons with National Dex elements mixed in.

gen9dlc11v1.name: [Gen 9 DLC 1] 1v1
gen9dlc11v1.desc: Bring three Pokémon to Team Preview and choose one to battle.

gen9doublesbrokencup.name: [Gen 9] Doubles Broken Cup
gen9doublesbrokencup.desc: [Gen 9] Doubles Hackmons Cup but with only the most powerful Pokémon, moves, abilities, and items.

gen9randomroulette.name: [Gen 9] Random Roulette
gen9randomroulette.desc: Random Battles in a random generation! [Gen 1] Random Battle - [Gen 9] Random Battle.

gen9randombattlemayhem.name: [Gen 9] Random Battle Mayhem
gen9randombattlemayhem.desc: [Gen 9] Random Battle with Team Preview and elements of Camomons, Inverse, Scalemons, and Shared Power.

gen9computergeneratedteams.name: [Gen 9] Computer-Generated Teams
gen9computergeneratedteams.desc: Teams generated automatically based on heuristics (rules), with levels based on previous success/failure in battle. Not affiliated with Random Battles formats. Some sets will by nature be worse than others, but you can report egregiously bad sets with this form.

gen9hackmonscup.name: [Gen 9] Hackmons Cup
gen9hackmonscup.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any ability, moves, and item.

gen9doubleshackmonscup.name: [Gen 9] Doubles Hackmons Cup
gen9doubleshackmonscup.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any ability, moves, and item. Now with TWICE the Pokémon per side!

gen9brokencup.name: [Gen 9] Broken Cup
gen9brokencup.desc: [Gen 9] Hackmons Cup but with only the most powerful Pokémon, moves, abilities, and items.

gen9challengecup1v1.name: [Gen 9] Challenge Cup 1v1
gen9challengecup1v1.desc: Get a randomized team of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any legal ability, moves, and item, and choose one to battle.

gen9challengecup2v2.name: [Gen 9] Challenge Cup 2v2
gen9challengecup2v2.desc: Get a randomized team of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any legal ability, moves, and item, and choose two to battle in a doubles format.

gen9challengecup6v6.name: [Gen 9] Challenge Cup 6v6
gen9challengecup6v6.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any legal ability, moves, and item.

gen8randombattle.name: [Gen 8] Random Battle
gen8randombattle.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with sets that are generated to be competitively viable.

gen8battlefactory.name: [Gen 8] Battle Factory
gen8battlefactory.desc: Randomized teams of Pokémon for a generated Smogon tier with sets that are competitively viable.

gen8bssfactory.name: [Gen 8] BSS Factory
gen8bssfactory.desc: Randomized 3v3 Singles featuring Pokémon and movesets popular in Battle Stadium Singles.

gen8superstaffbros4.name: [Gen 8] Super Staff Bros 4
gen8superstaffbros4.desc: The fourth iteration of Super Staff Bros is here! Battle with a random team of Pokémon created by the sim staff.

gen8hackmonscup.name: [Gen 8] Hackmons Cup
gen8hackmonscup.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any ability, moves, and item.

gen8cap1v1.name: [Gen 8] CAP 1v1
gen8cap1v1.desc: Randomly generated 1v1-style teams only including Pokémon made by the Create-A-Pokémon Project.

gen8bdsprandombattle.name: [Gen 8 BDSP] Random Battle
gen8bdsprandombattle.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with sets that are generated to be competitively viable.

gen7randombattle.name: [Gen 7] Random Battle
gen7randombattle.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with sets that are generated to be competitively viable.

gen7battlefactory.name: [Gen 7] Battle Factory
gen7battlefactory.desc: Randomized teams of Pokémon for a generated Smogon tier with sets that are competitively viable.

gen7bssfactory.name: [Gen 7] BSS Factory
gen7bssfactory.desc: Randomized 3v3 Singles featuring Pokémon and movesets popular in Battle Spot Singles.

gen7hackmonscup.name: [Gen 7] Hackmons Cup
gen7hackmonscup.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any ability, moves, and item.

gen6battlefactory.name: [Gen 6] Battle Factory
gen6battlefactory.desc: Randomized teams of Pokémon for a generated Smogon tier with sets that are competitively viable.

gen1challengecup.name: [Gen 1] Challenge Cup
gen1challengecup.desc: Randomized teams of level-balanced Pokémon with absolutely any legal moves.

gen1hackmonscup.name: [Gen 1] Hackmons Cup
